chapters.title: Chapter 10:  The Use of Dragons
chapters.info: Abors, p. 234—One of Taim's cronies, and part of the team of Asha'man and Aes Sedai who are trying to Turn Logain, Toveine, Gabrelle, Androl, and Pevara. He has thick eyebrows. He was one of the Asha'man who went over to the Shadow of his own volition.
